name: waterfall
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user charges the foe at an awesome speed. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
flavor_text.platinum: The user charges the foe at an awesome speed. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user charges at the foe rapidly, and may make it flinch. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
